remarks: Alternate definition of the category of unital rings (in a universe). (Contributed by AV, 16-Mar-2020.)
statement:
dfringc2.c $e |- C = ( RingCat ` U ) $.
dfringc2.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. V ) $.
dfringc2.b $e |- ( ph -> B = ( U i^i Ring ) ) $.
dfringc2.h $e |- ( ph -> H = ( RingHom |` ( B X. B ) ) ) $.
dfringc2.o $e |- ( ph -> .x. = ( comp ` ( ExtStrCat ` U ) ) ) $.
dfringc2 $p |- ( ph -> C = { <. ( Base ` ndx ) , B >. , <. ( Hom ` ndx ) , H >. , <. ( comp ` ndx ) , .x. >. } ) $.
